p:
With respect to arbovirus infection in HIV-positive patients, data are scarce, although favorable outcomes have been reported (
20 ,
26 ,
27 ). In a study of 43 HIV-positive patients with confirmed ZIKV infection, no hospitalizations, complications, or deaths were found, and CD4 cell counts and HIV viral load did not differ after ZIKV infection (
28 ). Regarding arbovirus infections in patients immunosuppressed for other reasons, available data are extremely limited and no firm conclusions can be drawn.
